# C part
```{r}
mu<-matrix(c(3,1), nrow=2)
sigma<-matrix(c(4,1,1,2), nrow=2)
samples<-rmvnorm(100, mu, sigma)
plot(samples)

```


# D part
```{r}
colMeans(samples)
S<-cov(samples)
S
ev<-eigen(S)
ev$values
ev$vectors

trac_real<-S[1,1]+S[2,2]
trac1<-sum(ev$values)
trac_real==trac1

deter_real<-S[1,1]*S[2,2]-S[2,1]*S[1,2]
deter_eig<-ev$values[1]*ev$values[2]
deter_real==deter_eig
```
